plot: Centers on Joe Waxman, a conflict-avoidant children's book author caught in an ongoing tug of war between two needy, flawed people: his wife Jane and his handsome ladies man co-author and best friend Joe Dougan.
title: Joe, Joe & Jane
plot_es: Centers on Joe Waxman, a conflict-avoidant children's book author caught in an ongoing tug of war between two needy, flawed people: his wife Jane and his handsome ladies man co-author and best friend Joe Dougan.
plot_en: Centers on Joe Waxman, a conflict-avoidant children's book author caught in an ongoing tug of war between two needy, flawed people: his wife Jane and his handsome ladies man co-author and best friend Joe Dougan.
